HI there,  I agree with Doug, it is fake chinese crap.  The first give away=
 is that it is being sold from china, the other give aways include the tang=
, signature, shape of the blade and kissaki, fake fittings etc.
 
Since you=
 are new to collecting, I suggest going to Rich Stein, and Rich Turners web=
 sites and looking under the "fake sword" sections, they are every informat=
ive and will save you alot of money.
 
Please buy from a reputable dealer o=
r someone you know.  If buying from ebay check feedback and stay away from =
any auctions out of china,  99.99 percent of them are junk and outright lia=
rs.
 
Good luck,
 
Louis
